query:
INSERT INTO cards (id, deck_id, front, back, media_url)
        SELECT 
            UNNEST($1::text[]),
            $2,
            UNNEST($3::text[]),
            UNNEST($4::text[]),
            UNNEST($5::text[])
        ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET
            front = EXCLUDED.front,
            back = EXCLUDED.back,
            deck_id = EXCLUDED.deck_id,
            media_url = EXCLUDED.media_url
